statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ]; then cd "$cwd" && branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "$status" != "0" ]; then git_info=" [$branch*]"; else git_info=" [$branch]"; fi; else git_info=""; fi; time=$(date +%H:%M:%S); printf "\033[2m%s | %s | %s%s | %s\033[0m" "$model" "$style" "$dir" "$git_info" "$time"
